TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CachedDataItem extends Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataNodeBase

summary.span: 表示文档级自定义中的缓存数据对象，该文档级自定义通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建。

span.span: Represents a cached data object in a document-level customization that was created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关在文档级自定义项中缓存数据的详细信息, 请参阅在服务器上[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data)和[访问文档中的数据](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server)。For more information about caching data in document-level customizations, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data) and [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server). ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查 Excel 工作簿的数据缓存中的每个, 并显示每个缓存数据对象的名称。The following code example examines each in the data cache of an Excel workbook and displays the name of each cached data object. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 一个控制台应用程序项目或一些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用:References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll - `Imports`(对于 Visual Basic) 或`using` (对于C#) 代码文件顶部的和命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. [!code-csharp[Trin_ServerDocument#5](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Trin_ServerDocument#5](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置缓存数据对象类型的程序集限定名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the assembly-qualified name of the type of the cached data object.

value.span: 缓存数据对象的类型的程序集限定名称。

span.span: The assembly-qualified name of the type of the cached data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回缓存数据类型的程序集限定名称, 此名称对于创建位于数据缓存中的自定义类型的新实例很有用。The property returns an assembly-qualified name of the cached data type that is useful for creating a new instance of a custom type that is in the data cache. 例如, 可以通过将程序集限定的类型名称传递给方法来获取自定义数据类型的。For example, you can get the of a custom data type by passing the assembly-qualified type name to the method. 然后, 可以通过将此实例作为参数传递给方法来创建自定义类型的实例。You can then create an instance of the custom type by passing this as a parameter to the method. 有关属性返回的程序集限定类型字符串的格式的详细信息, 请参见属性。For details about the format of the assembly-qualified type string that is returned by the property, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法修改在 Excel 工作簿的工作表中缓存的字符串的值。The following code example uses the method to modify the value of a string that is cached in a worksheet of an Excel workbook. 该代码使用属性来验证缓存的数据对象是否为字符串, 然后再尝试修改该对象。The code uses the property to verify that the cached data object is a string before trying to modify it. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 一个 Excel 文档级自定义项, 它具有`Sheet1` `ExcelWorkbook1`命名空间中的一个类和一个名为`CachedString`的`Sheet1`类中的缓存字符串。A document-level customization for Excel that has a `Sheet1` class in the `ExcelWorkbook1` namespace, and a cached string in the `Sheet1` class named `CachedString`. - 一个控制台应用程序项目或一些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用:References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll - `Imports`(对于 Visual Basic) 或`using` (对于C#) 代码文件顶部的和命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. [!code-csharp[Trin_ServerDocument#9](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Trin_ServerDocument#9](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 获取或设置通过 表示的缓存数据对象的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the cached data object that is represented by the .

value.span: 所表示的缓存数据对象的名称。

span.span: The name of the cached data object that is represented by the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来显示 Excel 工作簿中的缓存数据对象的名称。The following code example uses the property to display the names of the cached data objects in an Excel workbook. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 一个控制台应用程序项目或一些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用:References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll - `Imports`(对于 Visual Basic) 或`using` (对于C#) 代码文件顶部的和命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. [!code-csharp[Trin_ServerDocument#5](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Trin_ServerDocument#5](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 如果缓存数据对象为 或 ，获取或设置描述由 表示的缓存数据对象的架构。

span.span: Gets or sets a schema that describes the cached data object that is represented by the , if the cached data object is a or .

value.span: 如果缓存的数据对象是或, 则此属性返回描述缓存的数据对象的架构; 否则为。

span.span: If the cached data object is a or , this property returns a schema that describes the cached data object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 有关演示如何使用属性的代码示例, 请参阅[ServerDocument 示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4d5a9093-d648-4c66-a182-65bebf6016d7)。For a code example that demonstrates how to use the property, see [ServerDocument Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4d5a9093-d648-4c66-a182-65bebf6016d7).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SerializeDataInstance(object value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 该对象包含要保存到数据缓存中的对象的数据。

span.span: The object that contains the data you want to save to an object in the data cache.

summary.span: 将数据序列化为通过 表示的缓存数据对象。

span.span: Serializes data to the cached data object that is represented by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法初始化或修改缓存数据对象的值。Use the method to initialize or modify the value of a cached data object. 此方法将`value`参数序列化为所表示的缓存数据对象。This method serializes the `value` parameter into the cached data object that the represents. 若要对复杂缓存数据对象 (如或) 中的特定数据值进行更改, 请将缓存数据的 XML 表示形式反序列化为缓存对象的新实例, 对此副本进行更改, 然后使用将更改序列化回数据缓存的方法。To make changes to specific data values in a complex cached data object, such as a or , deserialize the XML representation of the cached data into a new instance of the cached object, make the changes to this copy, and then use the method to serialize the changes back into the data cache. 有关详细信息, 请参阅在[服务器上访问文档中的数据](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server)和[演练:更改服务器](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server)上工作簿中的缓存数据。For more information, see [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server) and [Walkthrough: Changing Cached Data in a Workbook on a Server](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server). 此方法使用 DiffGram 格式将、 和类型化数据集对象序列化到数据缓存中。This method uses the DiffGram format for serializing , , and typed dataset objects into the data cache. 这可确保将脱机文档中的数据缓存更改正确地发送到服务器。This ensures that changes to the data cache in an offline document are sent to the server correctly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法修改在 Excel 工作簿的工作表中缓存的字符串的值。The following code example uses the method to modify the value of a string that is cached in a worksheet of an Excel workbook. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 一个 Excel 文档级自定义项, 它具有`Sheet1` `ExcelWorkbook1`命名空间中的一个类和一个名为`CachedString`的`Sheet1`类中的缓存字符串。A document-level customization for Excel that has a `Sheet1` class in the `ExcelWorkbook1` namespace, and a cached string in the `Sheet1` class named `CachedString`. - 一个控制台应用程序项目或一些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用:References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll - `Imports`(对于 Visual Basic) 或`using` (对于C#) 代码文件顶部的和命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. [!code-csharp[Trin_ServerDocument#9](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Trin_ServerDocument#9](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 获取或设置由 表示的缓存数据对象的 XML 表示形式。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML representation of the cached data object that is represented by the .

value.span: 所表示的缓存数据对象的 XML 表示形式。

span.span: The XML representation of the cached data object that is represented by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取缓存数据对象的值, 请使用属性将缓存数据的 XML 表示形式反序列化为缓存的数据对象的新实例。To get the value of a cached data object, use the property to deserialize the XML representation of the cached data into a new instance of the cached data object. 然后, 你可以更改此副本并将更改序列化回数据缓存。You can then make changes to this copy and serialize the changes back into the data cache. 在大多数情况下, 可以使用方法将已更改的对象序列化到数据缓存中。In most cases, you can use the method to serialize the changed object into the data cache. 如果要对缓存数据的更改执行自己的序列化, 还可以直接写入到属性。If you want to perform your own serialization for changes to cached data, you can also write directly to the property. 但是, 如果您要对将使用 更新到数据库的、或类型化数据集进行更改, 请在将更改写入缓存的数据时指定 DiffGram 格式。However, if you are making changes to a , , or a typed dataset that will be updated to a database by using a , specify the DiffGram format when you write the changes to the cached data. 否则, 对或的更改将作为新行而不是更改的行添加到数据库中。Otherwise, the changes to the or will be added to the database as new rows instead of changed rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server)。For more information, see [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性获取在 Excel 工作簿的工作表中缓存的字符串的值。The following code example uses the property to get the value of a string that is cached in a worksheet of an Excel workbook. 该示例在消息框中显示值。The example displays the value in a message box. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 一个 Excel 文档级自定义项, 它具有`Sheet1` `ExcelWorkbook1`命名空间中的一个类和一个名为`CachedString`的`Sheet1`类中的缓存字符串。A document-level customization for Excel that has a `Sheet1` class in the `ExcelWorkbook1` namespace, and a cached string in the `Sheet1` class named `CachedString`. - 一个控制台应用程序项目或一些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用:References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll - `Imports`(对于 Visual Basic) 或`using` (对于C#) 代码文件顶部的和命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. [!code-csharp[Trin_ServerDocument#10](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Trin_ServerDocument#10](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 有关演示如何使用属性修改和序列化缓存更改的代码示例, 请参阅[演练:更改服务器](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server)上工作簿中的缓存数据。For a code example that demonstrates how to use the property to modify and serialize changes to a cached , see [Walkthrough: Changing Cached Data in a Workbook on a Server](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server).
